title: Development of RAP Tag, a Novel Tagging System for Protein Detection and Purification.
affi: 1 Department of Regional Innovation, Tohoku University Graduate School of Medicine , Sendai, Japan .
2 New Industry Creation Hatchery Center, Tohoku University , Sendai, Japan .
abst: Affinity tag systems, possessing high affinity and specificity, are useful for protein detection and purification. The most suitable tag for a particular purpose should be selected from many available affinity tag systems. In this study, we developed a novel affinity tag called the "RAP tag" system, which comprises a mouse antirat podoplanin monoclonal antibody (clone PMab-2) and the RAP tag (DMVNPGLEDRIE). This system is useful not only for protein detection in Western blotting, flow cytometry, and sandwich enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay, but also for protein purification.
